    • parseTag

      public static Tag parseTag(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException, ConverterException
      parsing tag by matroska specification matroska spec tag = VINT id, VINT size, data
      Parameters:
      inputStream - - stream to get value
      Returns:
      tag, without parsing tag data, because it delegate to an tag itself
      Throws:
      IOException - - in case of IO error
      ConverterException - - in case of any conversion exception
